roleset.name: emit high-pitched continuous sound
roleset.note: WHINE-V NOTES: Updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls animal_sounds-38, complain-37.8, manner_speaking-37.3, sound_emission-43.2. (from whine.01-v)
WHINING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, whine.01. Corresponds to VNcls animal_sounds-38, complain-37.8, manner_speaking-37.3, sound_emission-43.2. (from whining.01-n)

roles.note: verb frame's arg1 split into 2 args here, in case both appear (the whine and its subject matter). (from whining.01-n)

example.name: straight intransitive
example.text: Wires whined as a cold November blast rocked the silver wings, but the engine roar was reassuring to the pilot bundled in the open cockpit.
example.arg: as a cold November blast rocked the silver wings

example.name: adjectival
example.text: He would no longer have to see that fat face, hear that whining voice.

example.name: with aspects of motion
example.text: When it was followed by a second , whining [*] even closer, Cobb swerved sharply aside into a depression.

example.name: all args
example.text: John whined to his mommy that he hated looking like a girl
example.arg: that he hated looking like a girl

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: Or how about his whining that the wealthy are being ?squeezed? and ?abused? while saying the minimum wage needs to reduced immediately.
example.arg: that the wealthy are being "squeezed" and "abused"
while saying the minimum wage needs to be reduced immediately

example.name: args 0, 1 and 3
example.text: John annoyed Mary with all his whining "WHY ME!" about the traffic ticket.
